column1: a Presidential Election as such each of the parties was aiming to win the election. This was a highly
contested  election.  Witness  Hathalawatta  (PW  1)  in  his  evidence  admitted  that  he  is  a  strong
supporter  of  the  UNP  and  had  opted  to  give  up  his  carrier  as  a  teacher  to  become  the
coordinating secretary to Hon. Thalatha Athukorale, MP consequent to this incident.
